title: Intha Siripinai Angu Paarthen Lyrics Naam Iruvar Namakku Iruvar
stanzas:
Intha Siripinai Angu Paarthen Lyrics Naam Iruvar Namakku Iruvar
#KarthikRaja #Hariharan

intha siripinai engu paarthen
minnal theriththadhu adhil paarthen
indha thudippinai engu paarthen
unnidathil mattumthaan paarthen.(2)

kaalai manjal veyil parthaen
poove undhan niram paarthaen
parkkum undhan vizhi paarthaen
kadhal endha niram paarthaen

paarvaikku oar paarvai
edhirp paarkiraen.
vaaraadha thookkatha
vazhi parkkiren

kasangiya thalaiyanai paarthu
ilamaiyin pasiyai paarthen
anigra udaigalum endrendum
sumaigal aagumo.

indha siripinai engu paarthaen
minnal therithadhu adhil paarthen
kalla sirippinai engu paarthen
andhiyinil konjamthaan paarthen

mazhayil vaanavillai paarthen
undhan vetkam adhu paarthaen
saaral sindhuvathai paarthen
undhan muththam adhil paarthen

thaen oorum poo paarthu
idhazh paarkiren
kannaadi paarthaal unai
paarkiren.

pulveli meedhinil thoongum
paniyinai thinamum paarthen
mozhiyinil sollida
vaarthaigal illaamal ponathe.

intha siripinai engu paarthen
minnal theriththadhu adhil paarthen
indha thudippinai engu paarthen
unnidathil mattumthaan paarthen.
category: Song:Intha Siripinai Angu Paarthen - Naam Iruvar Namakku Iruvar
